SELECT INDTL.SLS_IN_DTL_DATE, NVL(INDTL.SLS_IN_DTL_REMK, ' ') AS SLS_IN_DTL_REMK,
PRDCD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME,
STOCK.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, STOCK.FNS_PRD_STK_VOL, STOCK.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO
FROM BF_SALES_FINISH_PRODUCT_STOK STOCK JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE PRDCD ON STOCK.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = PRDCD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_IN_DTL INDTL ON STOCK.SLS_IN_DTL_NO = INDTL.SLS_IN_DTL_NO
WHERE FNS_PRD_STK_VOL > 0 ORDER BY SLS_IN_DTL_DATE DESC
